body_html:
@mrry This is the code block in def replica_device_setter()

 ps_job_name = ps_device.lstrip("/job:")
 if ps_job_name not in cluster_spec or cluster_spec[ps_job_name] is None:
      return None

if the argument ps_device="/job:ps/cpu:0" it will return None
body:
@mrry  This is the code block in def replica_device_setter()

```
 ps_job_name = ps_device.lstrip("/job:")
 if ps_job_name not in cluster_spec or cluster_spec[ps_job_name] is None:
      return None
```

if the argument `ps_device="/job:ps/cpu:0"` it will return None
